name: Thank God It's Friday
description:
It's 17:00 on a Friday - get home as quickly as possible! The game as it is right now has got a title screen (without actual title) and two mini games. The two games are two kinds of endless runners with randomly generated obstacles.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Known issues:

Right now, there are some bugs concerning collision and stuttering movement in the office level. And I had to zoom out on the office level because the resolution was too low for the speed of the movement (That's why it's so empty). I'm trying to fix it ASAP.
